mapper.select: select brand_id codeId,brand_nm codeNm from itbrnd where 1=1 and brand_id like CONCAT(#{codeId}, '%') and brand_nm like CONCAT('%',#{codeNm}, '%')
select id codeId,vd_nm codeNm from cmvdmr where 1=1 and id like CONCAT(#{codeId}, '%') and vd_nm like CONCAT('%',#{codeNm}, '%') and vendor_type='01'
select id as value,vd_nm as label from cmvdmr where 1=1 and vendor_type='01'
